level.text: The election and installation of officers shall be at the annual meeting in December of each year.
Officers shall be elected by a majority vote at the annual meeting of the Trust.
Elected officers shall assume office at the close of the annual meeting in December and shall serve for a term of one year or until their successors shall be elected, or appointed or installed.
Any elected officer shall be eligible for reelection to succeed him or herself but shall not be eligible to hold office for more than two terms successively.
